# Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


# Import data

```{r}
population <- readxl::read_excel("01_data/raw/df.xlsx") 
bec_backcast_l1ux <- read_csv("01_data/raw/Data Request MS242_03082023/BEC_BACKCAST_L1UX_20230302.csv")
```

# Format data

Fix type of variable to numeric

```{r}
population <- population %>% 
  mutate(
    across(everything(),
           ~ na_if(., "-")),
    across(c(`1945`:`2022`),
           ~ str_remove_all(., " ")),
    across(c(`1945`:`2022`),
           as.numeric),
  )
```

Add ISO2 and SALID0 id's variables:

```{r}
population <- population %>% 
  mutate(
    ISO2 = case_match(
      country,
      "argentina" ~ "AR",
      "brazil" ~ "BR",
      "chile" ~ "CL",
      "colombia" ~ "CO",
      "costa rica" ~ "CR",
      "el salvador" ~ "SV",
      "guatemala" ~ "GT",
      "mexico" ~ "MX",
      "nicaragua" ~ "NI",
      "panama" ~ "PA",
      "peru" ~ "PE"
    )
  ) %>% 
  left_join(
    bec_backcast_l1ux %>% 
      mutate(SALID0 = str_sub(SALID1, 1, 3)) %>% 
      select(ISO2, SALID0) %>% 
      distinct()
  ) %>% 
  relocate(ISO2, SALID0) %>% 
  arrange(SALID0)

population
```

Create fake SALID1:

```{r}
population <- population %>% 
  group_by(ISO2) %>% 
  mutate(
    SALID1 = paste0(SALID0, 100 + 1:n()),
    SALID1 = as.numeric(SALID1),
    .after = SALID0
  ) %>% 
  ungroup()
```


# Merge info

```{r}
library(mice)
```


```{r}
pop_1950_2015_imp <- population %>% 
  select(`1950`:`2015`) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mice(method = "rf",
       maxit = 10,
       seed = 2023,
       threshold = 1.1)

pop_1950_2015_imp <- complete(pop_1950_2015_imp) %>% 
  select(-c(x1953, x1962)) %>% 
  as_tibble()

population_imp <- population %>% 
  select(ISO2:City) %>% 
  bind_cols(pop_1950_2015_imp) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = x1950:x2015,
    names_to = "YEAR",
    values_to = "Population"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(YEAR = str_remove(YEAR, "x"),
         YEAR = as.numeric(YEAR))
```


```{r}
pop_bectuareal <- population_imp %>% 
  left_join(
    bec_backcast_l1ux %>% 
      select(ISO2:SALID1, YEAR, BECTUAREAL1UX)
  )
```

# Export data

```{r}
saveRDS(pop_bectuareal, 
        file = "01_data/processed/pop_bectuareal1ux.rds")
```
